mapper.select: select DepartmentId as departmentId, IssueTime as issueTime, IsWarningSignal as isWarningSignal, OperationTime as operationTime, WarningType as warningType, WarningAction as warningAction, WarningLevel_Class as warningLevelClass, GradeVaue_Class as gradeValueClass, LeadTime_Class as leadTimeClass, GradeVaue_NoClass as gradeValueNoClass, LeadTime_NoClass as leadTimeNoClass, IsOverTime as isOverTime from ScoreWarningSignal where IssueTime >= #{startTime} and IssueTime <= #{endTime} and DepartmentId = #{stationId} and warningType = #{warningType}
